Vengeance and Death

Ascended the throne after his father's death. Devagupta, the king of Malwa, killed his brother-in-law (Grahavarman of Kannauj) and imprisoned his sister Rajyashri. Rajyavardhana invaded Malwa and defeated Devagupta.

ЁЯТА
Deception

Shashanka, the king of Gauda (a friend of Devagupta), treacherously murdered Rajyavardhana.
